sentence.Network_en: For more details about these products, send a postcard marked HB/FF.
sentence.Network_cn: 要了解这些产品的详细信息，请寄来标明HB/FF字样的明信片。

sentence.Network_en: A toy store has marked down the Sonic Hedgehog computer game.
sentence.Network_cn: 一家玩具店降低了电脑游戏《刺猬索尼克》的售价。

sentence.Network_en: It was even marked on the map as a scenic route.
sentence.Network_cn: 它甚至还作为观光路线标在了地图上。

entry.tran: （改变或区别）显著的，显而易见的
entry.def: A marked change or difference is very obvious and easily noticed.

example.ex: There has been a marked increase in crimes against property...
He was a man of austere habits, in marked contrast to his more flamboyant wife...
example.tran: 他处事严谨，与他爱张扬的妻子形成了鲜明的对比。

entry.tran: 成为攻击对象的;处境危险的
entry.def: If you describe someone as a marked man or woman, you mean that they are in danger from someone who wants to harm or kill them.

example.ex: All he needs to do is make one phone call and I'm a marked man.
example.tran: 他只消打一个电话，我就大难临头了。

means.word_mean: 2. singled out for notice or especially for a dire fate;
3. having or as if having an identifying mark or a mark as specified; often used in combination;

auth_sentence.content: Venky's tenure has been marked by fan unrest.
auth_sentence.res_content: Venky's tenure has been marked by fan unrest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Venky's tenure has been marked by fan unrest.

auth_sentence.content: But that briefing marked the beginning of his nightmare.
auth_sentence.res_content: But that briefing marked the beginning of his nightmare.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But that briefing marked the beginning of his nightmare.

auth_sentence.content: A panache which marked him out in any company.
auth_sentence.res_content: A panache which marked him out in any company.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A panache which marked him out in any company.

Sentence.sentence: By reviewing only the marked parts.
So when a French submarine (潜水艇) detected the device's homing signal five days later, the discovery marked a huge step toward determining the cause of a tragedy in which 152 passengers were killed.

sentences.en: Colder weather in the fall is a marked difference from the heat of summer.
sentences.cn: 秋天天气比较凉爽, 与炎热的夏天明显不同。

means.word_mean: 成为敌人攻击目标的人

sentences.en: When they discovered he was a spy, he became a marked man.
sentences.cn: 一旦他们识破他的间谍身分，他的处境就变得十分危险。

sentences.en: He is a marked man for criticizing his boss who will fire him as soon as she can.
sentences.cn: 他由于批评老板而受到歧视;老板一有机会就要解雇他。
